channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0424; 08:25AM; 22932 W Burbank Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/49ZoAsZ; Woodland Hills; KNOCKDOWN: 32 firefighters extinguished the fire in 21 minutes. Crews prevented the fire from extending into the attic of the home. The home has excessive storage conditions which requires more time to conduct both the primary and secondary search. The primary is complete with no one found inside. Firefighter/Paramedics are providing patient care and transport for a burn patient (age/gender/condition unknown). No further details. ; FS 105; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 BC17 E106 E296 E305 E72 E84 EM17 RA104 RA72 RA84 T105 T96; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0424; 08:04AM; 22932 W Burbank Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/49ZoAsZ; Woodland Hills; One story, single family dwelling with one room well involved and one patient with burn injuries (condition unknown at this time). Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 105; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 BC17 E106 E296 E305 E72 E84 RA72 RA84 T105 T96; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1293; 05:21PM; 4184 N Sunswept Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uCXuaZ; Studio City; KNOCKDOWN: 36 firefighters extinguished the fire in 15 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters contained the fire to the 2nd floor (1st occupied floor). The one occupant home was safely outside the building. There are no other buildings damaged. ; FS 78; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 BC14 E108 E260 E278 E60 E86 E97 EM14 RA78 RA97 T60 T78; CH9; 18; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1293; 05:06PM; 4184 N Sunswept Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uCXuaZ; Studio City; Three story, ascending hillside home (two residential over garage) with the 1st floor well involved in fire. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. Additional resources are enroute. This call was originally received as a reported smoke and upgraded to a structure fire. ; FS 78; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 BC14 E108 E260 E278 E60 E86 E97 RA78 RA97 T60 T78; CH9; 18; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0962; 02:20PM; 9667 N Laramie Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3t0how8; Chatsworth; KNOCKDOWN: Firefighters extinguished the fire in 23 minutes. The extent of any potential damage to the exposed home is unknown at this time. Patient was transported in unknown condition. All questions regarding the circumstances of this incident origin are referred to LAPD. LAFD PIO Captain Erik Scott is enroute for media availability. No further details.; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AR33 AR34 BC10 BC14 BC15 BC17 CM20 CM22 CM40 CM42 E103 E104 E107 E27 E273 E275 E287 E289 E293 E296 E70 E8 EM12 EM15 EM17 HR3 PH1 PI1 RA104 RA107 RA72 RA73 RA96 SQ87 T73 T75 T87 T89 T93 T96 TL1 TM5 TM9 UR88 UR89; CH9; 13 18; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0962; 01:57PM; 9667 N Laramie Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3t0how8; Chatsworth; Single family dwelling, well involved in fire. Following protocol, firefighters were standing by due to multiple reports of person with gun involved in the house fire and LAPD reported shots fired. Firefighters got a line in place in a defensive position to knock back the bulk of the flames to provide LAPD the room to conduct their operation. LAPD then reported suspect in custody and firefighter/paramedics are responding to the patient for treatment/transport. Firefighters are now in an offensive operation for the original fire unit and any exposed homes. LAPD Inc# 2625; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 BC17 E104 E107 E273 E296 E70 RA107 RA96 T73 T96; CH9; 18; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0422; 08:45AM; 1446 W 182nd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SZPUkW; Harbor Gateway; KNOCKDOWN:32 LAFD firefighters (plus LA County Fire units) extinguished the fire in both the converted garage and the attic of the single family dwelling in 17 minutes with no injuries reported. No further details.; FS 79; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC6 E285 E38 E64 E79 RA79 RA85 T64 T85; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0422; 08:28AM; 1446 W 182nd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SZPUkW; Harbor Gateway; Fire in a detached, converted garage extended into the attic of the single family dwelling. Firefighters extinguished the fire in the converted garage and are in an offensive operation against the attic fire. LA County Fire Dept is also on scene assisting. No injuries reported. ; FS 79; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC6 E285 E38 E64 E79 RA79 RA85 T64 T85; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0344; 07:21AM; 1934 N Kenmore Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RpE6r5; Los Feliz; KNOCKDOWN: 60 firefighters extinguished the fire in 25 minutes. The building is updated to a 3 story (2 residential over parking) duplex with one unit on the 3rd floor well involved. One patient (age/gender ?) being transported in unknown condition. No further details.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC11 BC2 BC5 CM20 CM22 CM52 E2 E201 E227 E229 E250 E26 E261 E27 E56 E60 RA27 RA82 RA827 SO1 T1 T27 T29 T50 T61; CH9; 2 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0344; 07:21AM; 1934 N Kenmore Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RpE6r5; Los Feliz; Two story fourplex with heavy smoke showing from the 2nd floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC1 BC11 BC2 BC5 CM22 E2 E201 E227 E229 E250 E26 E261 E289 E295 E3 E56 E60 EM18 HR3 RA3 RA82 RA827 SQ95 T1 T27 T29 T50 T61 T89 T95 UR3 UR88; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart
